title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7849.4 - Time for applying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7849.4 - Time for applying

State Regulations

An application for a subpoena shall be made at least 15
days prior to the date of the evidentiary hearing at which the witness would
attend or the date on which the papers or other documents would be
produced. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7849.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
